items.sentence: We\'re not going to leave Mary alone with Tom, are we?
You don\'t seem to be as miserable as Tom seems to be.
When I saw Tom yesterday, he was wearing a cowboy hat.
When was the last time you helped Tom do his homework?
Who is in charge of the office while the boss is away?
Tom\'s roommate often leaves dirty dishes in the sink.
Tom, Mary, John and Alice all have driver\'s licenses.
I can\'t help but feel like I\'ve forgotten something.
Because I live near the school, I come home for lunch.
When was the last time I spent the whole day with you?
Be quiet. If you aren\'t quiet, you\'ll be thrown out.
Keep in mind that Tom doesn\'t speak French very well.
Tom called the police to report that Mary was missing.
Tom can play the piano better than anyone else I know.
I don\'t care what you say. It\'s not going to happen!
I\'m really looking forward to spending time with Tom.
I\'m sure Tom will loan you as much money as you need.
The last thing I want to do is cause you any problems.
The light was so strong that Tom had to shut his eyes.
The majority of big banks are introducing this system.
